title: Tests are skipped or not present in xplat
body:

nodes.body:
Oh, and for the record, I got the lists with PowerShell commands like:

``` PowerShell
Select-Xml -XPath "//test" -Path d:\msbuild\bin\x86\Windows_NT\Debug\*_TestResults.xml | % { $_.Node.Name + " " + $_.Node.result } | sort
```
